issue.title: www.forbes.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.forbes.com/sites/alexkonrad/2024/03/19/inflection-abandons-chatgpt-challenger-ceo-suleyman-joins-microsoft/?sh=74ad4a9247fb](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.forbes.com%2Fsites%2Falexkonrad%2F2024%2F03%2F19%2Finflection-abandons-chatgpt-challenger-ceo-suleyman-joins-microsoft%2F%3Fsh%3D74ad4a9247fb) ### Comment > There are leftovers of the paywall that make the website unusable. With adguard on, it pops up maybe 30 seconds after the page loads. Without adguard it pops up almost immediately. This happens the same way with the 3rd party bypass paywalls filter list disabled. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ycx3nycjh6o40swgw48wscsw8o8g8crchy945wgys4.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/pa0azhdoqxccko4kogckoo8csc4kwww83mlwp06caw.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v4.3.13 System version: | Windows 11 Browser: | Edge Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.forbes.com/sites/iainmartin/2024/03/20/key-stable-diffusion-researchers-leave-stability-ai-as-company-flounders/?sh=4d9d81f12ed6](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.forbes.com%2Fsites%2Fiainmartin%2F2024%2F03%2F20%2Fkey-stable-diffusion-researchers-leave-stability-ai-as-company-flounders%2F%3Fsh%3D4d9d81f12ed6) ### Comment > Forbes paywall is only partially blocked by adguard.
